name: Sewermon
description:
Can you fight your way out of the sewers filled with vile enemies?

- LEVEL UP  your character!
- EVOLVE into new forms, depending on your choices!
- FIGHT various enemies! Such as bats, recolored bats and slightly bigger bats!
- EXPLORE and search through objects to find the elusive green experience point that hurts you!

Game made for GoGodotJam 3, with the theme: EVOLUTION.

Also available at https://gotm.io/sozanek/sewermon!

Controls:
WSAD - Movement
SPACE - Dash
LMB - Attack
RMB - Use Primary Ability
SHIFT - Use Secondary Ability

Assets used:

Music by:

timbeek.com

Sound effects by:

Halftone SFX Pack Lite by VOiD1
